entries.journalEntry: we embarked out to Oregon today, i am optomistic
Today we saw some bison. I shot it down so we could have some food. I hope it fits in the wagon.
Sorry i haven't been writing the past couple days. Today was a bad day, we had to ford a river. That was harder than i thought, we lost some clothes, but we are not naked
Well, hello again, today we are low on water. The river yesterday was not clean to drink, so hopefully there is something coming up soon.
Well, Johanna is feeling sick, she thinks it was the fish that we ate last night, i ate some too, but not feeling as sick. We'll see after tomorrow.
It was my turn to ride in the wagon
Well, now i am feeling sick. short entry
Today we had no food for a couple of days until the evening when Joseph shot a wild bison. #eatingGoodTonight!
Today what a day. We met some people along the way. I took a likin' to this girl i met. I got her address, so next fort we come to, I will write her a letter
it was hot, but we shot a rattlesnake
Well, today was a bad day, we lost Josephine to a snake bite
